155311.content:
Everything was hazy for the young Rogue Ninja Itachi Uchiha. Together with Kisame and Konan his fellow Akatsuki members Itachi followed through on an order from Tobi and traced a lead they grasped on Sasuke, Itachi's brother who just killed Orochimaru.

The lead was an escaped experiment of Orochimaru's, near crazed from the horrific things he had seen. He was currently against a cliff as the three Akatsuki cornered him.

"Lemme just slice him up, he'll talk then." Kisame muttered with a grin, reaching for the hilt of his Samehada.

"No, I can handle this." Itachi knelt down on a knee and stared at the mans eyes. Briefly Itachi closed his eyes and focused his chakra, "Tsukiyomi!" He muttered as he cast the power of his Sharingan. Things went as they always did when Itachi used this, the world became twisted, deformed, time held no meaning.

Itachi often used this to break people he needed information from, and this was no exception. He quickly got the information he needed but before he dispelled his technique the man started laughing.

"You think all is well traitorous Uchiha, but you shall see.....the experiments affected me deeply and with my last breath I shall use an ability given to me via them. The man made a handsign and against Itachi's will the illusion he held shattered, the man and everything around him vanished. He was in an entirely new location.

Itachi quickly searched for his comrades, soon realizing he had some how shrunken, but before he could question it he found someone, a giant in his perspective, and not just any but one he knew.........

155332.title: Shippuden Sasuke?

1553321.content:
"Urk… What happened to me?" Sasuke muttered as his eyes slowly opened. All around him was darkness with only small slivers of light. He tried to stand only to realize he had no room to do so. Just where in the world was he? From what he could make out through the slivers of light he was being pinned by some sort of soft and moist ceiling.

That was odd. He tried to recall what happened to him only for his mind to go blank. That annoyed him to no end. For the life of him he just couldn't remember. The last thing he could recall was Kabuto sending him out on some sort of task for Orochimaru. After that... Nothing.

The more Sasuke tried to desperately recall what led up to his current situation, the more frustrated he became. After taking a moment to compose himself, he decided to find a way out of his narrow prison before figuring out the rest. Channeling chakra into his hand he released a burst of electricity at the ceiling with no effect.

That wasn't right. Whatever his lightning hit it destroyed. Targets weren't supposed to remain in tact. Sasuke tried again but was met with a different result. Instead of blowing the moist ceiling apart like he'd hoped, he felt his entire world rise up. "What's going on out there!"

No words greeted Sasuke. Instead he was met by the winds of rapid descent. The Uchiha prodigy felt his prison violently slam down. If not for the soft ceiling and equally soft ground he'd be crushed into a paste. This wasn't good. He needed out. He needed freedom from... Wherever the hell he was.

Activating his Sharingan, Sasuke began to crawl toward the light. As he did he bean to notice just how moist and squishy his prison really was. Had one of Orochimaru's snakes swallowed him? If so then the Sannin was dead the next time he saw him. The linger stench wasn't helping to calm him down either.

After what felt like an eternity, Sasuke finally managed to reach the light. He poked his head through the opening and was immediately assaulted by hot and smelly air. That was soon followed by the near blinding light of the sun. Sasuke tried to move the rest of his body but found himself unable to get free.

"Damn it!" he cursed. All he could do was take in the sight of the squishy platform beneath him and the two long pillars on either side of him. Apparently they were a part of the ceiling that was pressing him down. Just where in the hell was he?!

"So you're finally awake now?" A voice called from above.

Startled, Sasuke craned his neck toward the source... And his eyes widened.
1553321.title: The Tiny Uchiha!

Usually ino would say hi to choji but she wanted him to say hi to her this time. She walked past him and he said nothing. Ino was a little frustrated and walked past him again. Choji still eating said nothing. "That's it CHOJI!" she yelled. Choji still didn't bother to reply. "Choji" she yelled again.

Choji then stopped eating and stood up. "it seems i ran out" he said while shaking the bag. He tossed the bag in the garbage and walked off ignoring ino." Uggghhh" ino groaned "im sick of you ignoring me all the time she said. Ino made a few hands signs then yelled "Shunken jutsu." A puff of smoke appeared around choji and he disappeared (so it seemed). The jutsu how ever caused him to black out."Ill teach you to ignore me" she said to herself laughing evilly and headed home with choji in the palm of her hand. "Now where should i put you for now" she thought for a moment then stuck choji.....

Ino said " I know just the place to put you Choji."

she dropped him to the floor and he landed with a soft bounce as choji transformed into a ball. Choji reverted back to his normal form and looked up to see his blond friends foot slip out of her well worn sandal and place her bare sole right over him.

Ino dropped her sole onto her puny friend and pressed down as hard as she could. Choji could barely stand the crushing weight of his teammates foot let alone the strong, pungent odor that emanated from Ino's countless hours spent training in her footwear. without haste Choji quickly transformed back into a ball and relived some of the pressure bearing down from the giantesses immense sole. Caught off guard ino slipped on her rotund teammate and fell backwards freeing the young Akimichi.

Ow, my ass. Where did he go? Choji get back here under my foot or i'll sit on you all day!"

While the giant girl was stunned Choji used this opportunity to run underneath her bed, but before he can make it to freedom, the sultry blonde slammed her foot down on him again and he was trapped under a ninja girls smelly arch.

Choji did as he was told and soon Ino was rolling him from the heel of her foot to inbetween each of her toes.

Choji could only imagine the horror of spending countless hours smelling Ino's stinky and sweaty feet.

1553322221.content:
Boruto was frustrated as he chucked a kunai at his target. Once again he'd gotten into an argument with Sarada about the last mission. She couldn't just live with the fact that the mission was a success. No, she had to scold him about his antics and tactics.

So what if he was a bit cocky, in his mind he earned the right to be. He was more than skilled enough to take on a few grunts by himself. He didn't need a team to do that. Unfortunately Konohamaru-sensei and his father Lord Seventh disagreed. It was all so ridiculous.

The mission debriefing couldn't end fast enough. He needed to get away. Away from, Sarada, Konohamaru, and his father. Mitsuki was cool though.

Now he was alone, cucking kunai at none moving targets. He'd probably been at this for at least a few hours. It was still day out and he figured he worked up a good sweat. It was time to clean up and maybe hit up Ichiraku. The food there was pretty tasty.

Right as Boruto began to pick up the kunai he started to feel a bit lightheaded. Perhaps he'd been going at it harder than he thought? Too bad for him that wasn't the case. Upon closer inspection he started to notice a very faint glow around his body. His eyes widened... and the he fell back, darkness taking him.

When he came to, he was surrounded by darkness. Damp and smelly darkness.
1553322221.title: Boruto's Frustration

1553322222221.content:
Minato was not having a good day, what was supposed to be an average training session had turned into a complete disaster. He was currently out in the training grounds working on his sealing techniques when all of a sudden he felt light-headed.

Looking down at the seal he'd drawn he realized that he'd made a critical error. The characters were all wrong. He quickly tried to undo his mistake, but the damage had already been done. The world around Minato began to spin, it reminded him of the time he first time he used the Flying Raijin Jutstu.

The blonde Jounin felt like he was going to vomit. Maybe he shouldn't have tried to work on a new technique without Kushina present? She had told him in the past if he was going to work on his Fuinjutst he should do it when she's around.

Unfortunately for Minato she was at home. He tried to flash home with his signature technique, but found himself unable to do so. He was far too disoriented to use any jutsu. The spikey-haired blonde fell to he knees and his vision began to grow dark.

He tried again to do something, anything, but it was all for naught. Minato finally hit the ground, unconscious.

Seconds turned to minutes, and minutes turned to hours. It was then that Minato finally came to. His pushed himself up off the ground and clutched his head in pain. "Ugh! What happened to me?"

Looking around he noticed he appeared to be in some sort of tall forest. It didn't look any forest he knew? Was he still even in the Hidden Leaf? He wracked his brain trying to remember until the events previous struck him. He'd blacked out when working on a sealing technique.

He steadily rose to his feet to try and use his jutstu, but was interrupted by what felt like a massive earthquake. The tremor was so powerful that it sent the confused shinobi tumbling down. At first he thought he might be under attack, but that theory soon died when craned his neck upwards.

His eyes widened in shock. Everything seemed to become clear now. He hadn't gone anywhere, he was still in the training grounds. A much larger training ground. His failed seal had shrunken him.

Up above him was the giant form of...
1553322222221.title: When Seals go Wrong

choices: Kushina steps over Minato without noticing him
15533222222211.content:
Minato could hardly believe what he was seeing. Standing head and shoulders above him was none other than his wife, Kushina. The tiny blonde could only gawk at the size difference. At his perspective she must have been as tall as Hokage tower.

As she got closer the earthquakes became more powerful. It was obvious to the little shinobi that her footfalls were the cause. To a normal person a few steps is nothing, for an ant like him it felt as his world was shaking apart.

It was then a thought entered his mind, one that scared him stiff. He was in her path. She didn't see him, couldn't see him. She could literally snuff out his life under her sandal and she'd be none the wiser.

He needed to move...

Minato tried desperately to find his footing, only to again be reunited with the dirt. Kushina's continued footfalls were not making his life any easier. Looking back at her she had a serine smile on her face and was apparently carrying a lunch basket. She probably wanted to surprise him while he was training.

Seeing how trying to stand wasn't an option, he tried to use his technique. He had placed his own Raijin seal in Kushina's seal, so if he could access it he might be able to get some help. He tried to focus on the seal, but for some reason it just wouldn't activate.

Minato silently cursed, he was stuck!

Very soon a shadow fell over him. A shadow that made his eyes widen in terror. Kushina was right in front of him, her foot raised high in the air. He winced as he made out all the dirt and junk that littered the bottom of her sandal. Normally he would have never noticed, but at this size he had a whole new perspective.

Worse yet, outside of the dirt and pebbles trapped in the sandal treads, it wouldappear his wife had stepped in some gum. This wasn't good. He needed to get her attention fast, otherwise he was as good as dead!

"KUSHINA!!!" Minato cried.
15533222222211.title: The Towering Habanero

info.description:
A shrinking story where the shrinkee will go through nothing but foot torture ^^

You can pick anyone from the show to shrink but they must be at the mercy of a females feet!

Basically any foul language is allowed.

Torture is good too just dont be too graphic.
Any sort of foot related material is allowed in this story, licking, rubbing etc

The character will start at an inch in height but if you can find a spot in the story you can change that! mwhahaha lol

Characters can be and are recommended to be out of character for a more interesting story ^^
You do not have to have them OOC though.

You can place yourself into the story shrunken but you must remain unnamed! to help the readers insert themself into the role.

I want this story to do well so heres something for ya, 500 gp for good adds!!!! Meaning at least a well done paragraph!!

Nothing but feet in this story!

Aside from that go nuts. I hope to see alot of adds ^^

UPDATE!

Over 70 chapters ^^

Thanks Cinderaxis,Bossman, and everyone else who has added to my story.

IMPORTANT!

Transformation is now allowed, of course it follows the whole foot theme of this story. A person can become a sandal,a sock and anything else you can think of that involes feet.

UPDATE!

Okay I've put a lot of thought into this and decided, if you really want you can put something aside from feet in this story. I still want the focus to be feet of course but now if you desire it you can throw in a little variety.

And thanks again too all who have added
